name: You Are Not Welcome Here - HD Remaster
name_original: You Are Not Welcome Here - HD Remaster
description:
Don't stumble into places you don't belong, or you might get hurt...

Thrown into a strange place, with a strange person talking to you, you must find your way back.  Complete the puzzles and escape, if you can.

This is a remake of my 2017 game "You are (Not) Welcome Here", which I created in Unity for the Let's Create Game Jam #2. You can the old game here, if you want to take a look. The old version was made in a little over a week with the Unity game engine, while this version was made in a little under 3 weeks with the Godot game engine.

This version of the game has new features, a new layout with new puzzles, an overhauled visual style, and more!

Controls

Controls for keyboard and mouse:

  • WASD to move and mouse motion to move around
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact with objects and continue/fast-forward dialog boxes
  • F to toggle the flashlight on and off
  • Left click and right click to use acquired items.
  • Escape to pause and skip dialog

Controls for Xbox 360 controller (only controller tested, others may work though):

  • Left stick to move and right stick to look around
  • A button to jump
  • X button to interact and continue/fast-forward dialog boxes
  • Y button to toggle flashlight
  • Left shoulder button and right shoulder button to use acquired items.
  • Select/Back button to pause and skip dialog

Currently there is no options to configure the controls in the game, as I didn't want to delay the release of the game to add them. Likewise, there is no graphics options either. This may change in an update, so if you are having any issues with the default controls or graphics, please let me know in the comments below!

Change log: * Version 1.0.0 (09/18/2020) * Initial release! Credits for assets used: Textures: * Flame and smoke textures by Kenney.nl (CC0) * The overwhelming majority of environment and asset textures by CC0textures.com (CC0) * Door texture by 3DTextures.me (Free, but unknown license) * Gate and character textures by TwistedTwigleg * Solid colors are from a color pallet I used in Dreams of Fire. | Fonts: * OpenDyslexicMono-Regular - opendyslexic.org (SIL-OFL) | Music and Sounds: * Drone_Atmosphere - From MatiasMacSD - From the Sonnis.com GDC 2017 Bundle * Fear and Horror - From the OpenBundle - Downloaded from GameSounds.xyz * Sound effects from the Sonnis.com GDC 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 bundles. * Dialog samples from MicreaKitsune - OpenGameArt (CC0) | Everything else: * Created by TwistedTwigleg unless otherwise noted. * (I think I credited everything used above, but if I missed something, please let me know!) Final notes:

Thank you for looking at the game! I hope you enjoy it! Please consider following me on Twitter and YouTube if you liked the game, so you can follow along with my other projects.
